product_name: Sea to Summit Lightweight Dry Sack - XX Small
long_description: The Sea to Summit Lightweight dry sack keeps gear dry and functional whether you're backpacking, kayaking, stand up paddling, hiking, or just hanging out in the wilderness. Fully taped seams and a Hypalon(TM) roll-top closure provide reliable waterproof performance. Coated nylon body makes this a lightweight yet durable choice. White lining on the inside of the bag makes it easy to locate items. Durable buckle with D-ring attachment point secures roll top and can be attached to a pack or kayak. Comes in assorted colors only; sorry, specific color requests cannot be accommodated.
short_description: The Sea to Summit Lightweight dry sack keeps gear dry and functional whether you're backpacking, kayaking, stand up paddling, hiking, or just hanging out in the wilderness.
